snippet.title: Lapso: NIMBO - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
When a flash of light catches Kali Müller, she will have no choice but to advance through the depths of Rockrose to find out if the legends are true.

The Rockrose region has always been shrouded in mystery. Its trails were walked by hikers who claimed to have seen some figures crowned by a halo of light, but that is only part of the myth.


►►► Download LAPSO: NIMBO: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1360430/Lapso_NIMBO/ ◄◄◄
